bibl.title: Letter from [Howard A. Kelly] to Emilie Lawrence Reed, November 14, 1922

div1.p: [Kelly] writes that he supports Emilie Lawrence Reed's pension increase.

div1.head: Letter from [Howard A. Kelly] to Emilie Lawrence Reed, November 14, 1922
div1.p:
Thank you for your letter
and the enclosures.

Please use my name in any
way in your petition. The pension of $150 a
month is little enough (too little)! Let me
know whether or not I can write a letter to
any party likely to be interested in helping
you.

I wish that the new edition
of the Walter Reed book was out so that I could
send you several copies. I may have one or
two copies, however, of the present edition.
